remarks:
Addition with successor.  Theorem 4I(A2) of [Enderton] p. 79.  (Note that this version of ~ oasuc does not need Replacement.)  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.) 

---

 Addition with successor.  Theorem 4I(A2) of [Enderton] p. 79. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2014.)
statement: onasuc $p |- ( ( A e. On /\ B e. _om ) -> ( A +o suc B ) = suc ( A +o B ) ) $.
